column5: Is there any maps of the Red River out to the mouth of the lake. I'm heading up on the 8th and staying tell the 13th. Would like to have an idea of what I'm looking at when I get up there

Natural Resources of Manitoba sells topographical and water charts(depths etc). You can get a complete set from their office on Century Street. About $20 I think. I'll gather more info if you need it.
canadamapsales.com or .cau can get the address at the site if they cannot get them to you in time and pick up in winnipeg one afternoon
